Enterprise Application Tracker DocumentationÔÉÅ

Welcome to the Enterprise Application Tracker - an experimental application inventory system designed for tracking enterprise software application installations and their supporting infrastructure relationships within server-side environments.

Quick StartÔÉÅ

  1. Installation: See Installation Guide for deployment options

  2. User Guide: Read Getting Started for basic usage

  3. API Reference: Explore API Reference for programmatic access

  4. Administration: Consult Administrator Guide for system management

System OverviewÔÉÅ

The Enterprise Application Tracker provides basic capabilities for:

Core Features - Application Management: Track business applications with basic metadata - Server Tracking: Simple server inventory with application relationships - Database Inventory: Basic database and data store tracking - Role-Based Access Control: Five-tier permission system - REST API: Programmatic interface for data access and manipulation - Audit Logging: Basic activity tracking for compliance requirements

Current Limitations - This is an experimental system in early development - Limited reporting and analytics capabilities - Basic security features implemented - No physical asset tracking capabilities - Minimal integration features

Development Status

  • Version: 0.0.1 (Experimental)

  • Development Started: July 26, 2025

  • Current Status: Active development, experimental features

Test User Accounts

  • admin (Application Admin) - Full system access

  • sysmanager (Systems Manager) - Technical data access

  • technician (Technician) - Limited write access

  • bizmanager (Business Manager) - Business data read access

  • bizuser (Business User) - Basic read access

Deployment Options

  • Docker Compose: Development and testing deployments

  • Docker Swarm: Multi-container orchestration

  • Manual Installation: Traditional server deployment

Getting HelpÔÉÅ

Documentation Structure

  • User Guide: Basic user documentation for each role

  • API Reference: REST API endpoint reference

  • Administrator Guide: System administration procedures

  • Development Guide: Developer setup and contribution information

  • Security: Security implementation details

Support Channels

  • Documentation: Start with the relevant guide section

  • API Issues: Consult API Reference for endpoint details

  • Technical Support: Contact your system administrator

License and VersionÔÉÅ

  • Version: 0.0.1 (Experimental)

  • License: Enterprise License (contact your organization)

  • Documentation Updated: July 2025

Note

This documentation is for version 0.0.1 of the Enterprise Application Tracker. This is an experimental release and features may change significantly in future versions.
